title: How does Bald Head Island get away with building 16 groins on the southwest end of the island (see Google satellite view and Star News photo #51 29-Aug-11)? Aren\'t groins illegal in N.C.?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110615/ARTICLES/110619813?p=all&tc=pgall
